```{R}
library(DESeq2)
library(dplyr)
dds <- readRDS("dev/lncDESeq2Obj.Rds")
```
```{R}

d <- counts(dds, normalized = TRUE)
d %>% head
```

```{R}

annotation <- colData(dds)
annotation
```

```{R}

d <- d %>% data.frame
d

d$gene <- rownames(d)

d
```

```{R}

devtools::install(); library(ContrApption); ContrApption("test", data = d, annotation = annotation, idCol = "SampleID", groupCol = "Group")
```

```{R}

library(ContrApption)
ContrApption("test",
                                                         x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
                                                         y = c(1, 2, 4, 8, 16),
                                                         data = d,
                                                         annotation = annotation,
                                                         idCol = "SampleID",
                                                         groupCol = "Group")
```
